name: FaceTime with GirlDM
description:
FaceTime with GirlDM is an arcade-style game made for girl_dm_'s birthday!
It's time to steal some faces... Remove people's helmets and masks and steal their faces for mysterious reasons!

                              

How to play
Move with WASD/ZQSD/arrows.
Left-click to punch enemies and remove their masks.
Right-click to steal the face of enemies with no mask left!
Stealing faces gives a lot of points! Pay attention to the sound played when an enemy loses its final mask, it's time to stop punching and start grabbing!

Powerups
Powerups will regularly appear in the level. Grab them quickly, they disappear after a few seconds!

  POWER: Your attacks become bigger, and punches remove all masks at once!
  SCORE: You gain twice as much points for a few seconds!
  DEFENSE: Makes you invulnerable for a short while! DINK!
  VACUUM: A powerful weapon! Remove masks and steal faces at extreme speed!
 MAYO: A healthy snack which restores 1 health point!

Credits
Music is made by Natamber.
Sound effects are from Universal sound FX and SFXR.
Character sprites are based on Nuclear Throne (Steroids and Fish).
Font is Arcadepix.
